displaytitle: Striding male nude holding an object (a bow)
medium: Pen and brown ink on tan laid paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.
markings: Stamped in ink, lower right: [M in square] [Lugt 1853a]
inscribed:
Inscribed in brown ink, on patch upper right: Pallaiolo [in unknown hand]
Inscribed in brown ink, on mount bottom verso: No.5. Ia. B. | No. 116. Ant.° Pollajuolo. nato a firenze 1426 [in unknown hand]
